VOLSPOTCONNECT.DESCVOLNORM: Set the same volume level for all songs
VOLSPOTCONNECT.DESCAUTOPLAY: Autoplay similar songs when your music ends
VOLSPOTCONNECT.DESCSHAREDDEVICE: If enabled, the device is useable by any user on the network. If disable, a unique user uses it
VOLSPOTCONNECT.DESCHIGHBITRATE: The higher the bitrate value, the better the sound quality, but also the greater bandwidth requirement
